column4:
The format of the dates used in the dataset:
Year: YY or YYYY (e.g. 09 or 2009);\nMonth: M or MM (e.g. 3 or 03); Day: D or DD (e.g. 9 or 09); Hour (24h clock): h or hh (e.g. 8 or 08); Minute: m or mm (e.g. 5 or 05); Second: s or ss (e.g. 7 or 07); Separators: [Space] [:] [.] [-] [\] [/]
Start date of the measurements formatted according to above.
End date of the measurements formatted according to above.
